Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal

[Groovy] Class ReducedVfsURICollection

      • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal.ReducedVfsURICollection

        • Method Detail

          • @java.lang.Override boolean allResolved()

            Checks whether all URIs in the collections have been resolved.

            Returns:
            True is all are resolved.

          • @java.lang.Override boolean contains(VfsURI uri)

            Checks whether a specific URI is within a collection. The strings representations are compared to determine whether presence. This allows for both resolved and taged URIs to be compared. ANy vfs query properties will be ignored.

            Returns:
            Return true is the uri is contained within the collection.
            Parameters:
            uri

          • static ReducedVfsURICollection create(VfsURICollection primary, VfsURICollection secondary)

          • @java.lang.Override VfsURICollection filter(Spec<VfsURI> filterSpec)

            Restricts the contents of this collection to those files which match the given criteria. The filtered collection is live, so that it reflects any changes to this collection.

            Returns:
            The filtered collection.
            Parameters:
            filterSpec - The criteria to use to select the contents of the filtered collection.

          • @java.lang.Override java.util.Set<VfsURI> getUris()

            Contents of the collection. This will force all items to be resolved.

            Returns:
            Returns the contents of this collection as a Set.

          • @java.lang.Override boolean isEmpty()

            Check whether collection is empty

            Returns:
            Returns true if this collection is empty.

          • @java.lang.Override java.util.Iterator iterator()

            Returns an iterator over elements of type T.

            Returns:
            an Iterator.

          • @java.lang.Override VfsURICollection resolve()

            Attempt to have all URIs in the primary collection resolved. Throws if there is a failure.

            Returns:
            This collection with all URIs resolved
            Throws:
            StopExecutionException if a URI cannot be resolved.
